content:
### EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Electricity generator at position(-29.5, 30.5)
Consists of steam engine (position -29.5, 30.5), boiler (position -34.5, 30.0), and offshore pump (position -10.5, 25.5).

### Copper plate mine at position(-18.0, -49.0)
Consists of the following entities:
- Furnace (position -18.0, -49.0) with no ingredients to smelt.

### Iron plate factory at position(5.0, -73.0)
Consists of the following entities:
- Furnace (position 5.0, -73.0) that currently has 6 iron ore available for smelting.

### Lab at position(-15.5, 18.5)
Consists of the following entities:
- Lab (position -15.5, 18.5) which is currently not powered.

### Pipe groups
- PipeGroup (position -24.5, 21.5) with full output status.
- PipeGroup (position -4.5, 21.5) with empty status.
- PipeGroup (position -4.5, 23.5) with empty status.

### Electricity network
Consists of multiple small electric poles, including:
- Small electric pole (position -30.5, 27.5)
- Small electric pole (position -28.5, 27.5)
- Small electric pole (position -27.5, 27.5)
- Small electric pole (position -27.5, 28.5)

### ERROR TIPS

### Errors when inserting items from inventory
- Ensure you have the required items in your inventory before attempting to insert them into another entity. In this case, there was an attempt to insert iron ore into a furnace without having any iron ore in the inventory.

### Errors when using extracting but being too far
- Make sure to move to the target entity where you want to extract from before extracting items.

### Errors when placing into a tile which is occupied by another entity
- Ensure you can place an entity to a tile before attempting placing. 

### Errors related to power and connections
- Check that all entities requiring power are properly connected to the electricity network to avoid issues like "no power" or "not connected to power network".
